main event: A witness observed a glowing object, described as a ball of flame breaking up, lasting about 3 seconds, believed to be a falling satellite or meteorite.
interesting points: The sighting was believed to last less than 3 seconds., The object was identified as a potential falling satellite or meteorite., The observer saw the object while driving to their camp., The object was observed for about 10 minutes prior to the event., The object's size was estimated to be about 30 to 40 feet in diameter.
